DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize that when compared to usual care a greater proportion of hospitalized diabetic patients who are candidates for cholesterol lowering will be discharged with a prescription for a statin if their physicians are contacted by a pharmacist to discuss treatment guidelines.
DOC.brief_title: Improving Adherence to Prescribing Guidelines for Cholesterol Lowering in Hospitalized Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patients with diabetes LDL >= 100 Terminal illness Pregnancy Intolerance or contraindication to statin
